channel.title: Jenkins X ‚Äì Demos, talks and blog posts
channel.description: Recent content in Demos, talks and blog posts on Jenkins X

item.title: Docs: Articles
item.description:

item.title: Docs: Create Cluster
item.description:
This demo creates a new kubernetes cluster using these commands in parallel:

  • jx create cluster gke
  • jx create cluster aks
  • jx create cluster minikube

item.title: Docs: Create Cluster GKE
item.description: This demo uses the jx create cluster gke command to create a new kubernetes cluster:

item.title: Docs: Create Spring
item.description: This demo uses the jx create spring command to create a new Spring Boot application with CI / CD pipelines with GitOps promotions:
